getUri().Description: Returns the DataItem's Uri. @B_android#net#Uri#getHost_E@ returns the id of the node that created it.

getAssets().Description: A map of assets associated with this data item. @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataMapItem_E@ may be used to store structured data in the network, including assets.

getData().Description: An array of data stored at the specified @B_android#net#Uri_E@. @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataMapItem_E@ may be used to store structured data in the network.

setData(byte[]).Description: Sets the data in a data item. The current maximum data item size limit is approximtely 100k. Data items should generally be much smaller than this limit.

ClassDesc: The base object of data stored in the Android Wear network. @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataItem_E@ are replicated across all devices in the network. It contains a small blob of data and associated assets. A @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataItem_E@ is identified by its Uri, which contains its creator and a path.
